alert.note: Alert for Owyhee Mountains; Southern Highlands; Western Twin Falls BLM (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 27 at 8:19AM MDT until July 27 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITIES WILL CREATE CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS THIS AFTERNOON AND EARLY EVENING... .Dry southwest flow aloft will continue today. As a result, gusty southwest winds with low relative humidity will redevelop this afternoon and early evening across Southwest Idaho. The dry and gusty combination will result in critical fire weather conditions. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITIES FOR OWYHEE MOUNTAINS...WESTERN TWIN FALLS BLM AND SOUTHERN HIGHLANDS...WHICH ARE FIRE WEATHER ZONES 423...424 AND 426... * WINDS...West to southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 35 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...8 to 15 percent. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will occur shortly.

area.areaDesc: Owyhee Mountains; Southern Highlands; Western Twin Falls BLM
